tool_description: Estimates potential harvest yields based on population density, plant size, and environmental factors.

plant_count.description: Number of harvestable plants in survey area

average_plant_size.description: Average plant size category: small, medium, large, extra_large

plant_part_target.description: Part to harvest: leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, seeds

site_quality.description: Site growing conditions: poor, fair, good, excellent

error_messages: Invalid survey area: Must be greater than 0 square meters
Invalid plant count: Must be 0 or positive integer
Invalid plant size: Use one of [small, medium, large, extra_large]
Invalid plant part: Use one of [leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, seeds]
Invalid site quality: Use one of [poor, fair, good, excellent]
Invalid harvest efficiency: Must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Species not in yield database: Cannot estimate yields for unknown species
usage: Conduct a survey of the harvest area, count plants, assess their size and site quality. The tool estimates potential yields and harvest logistics.

yield_per_plant_g.description: Average yield per plant in grams
